trans-unit.source: Defines the page resolution of printed output as either a qualitative value or as dots per inch, or both.
trans-unit.target: 定義列印輸出的頁面解析度，可為質化值、Dot Per Inch (DPI) 或兩者併用。

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Printing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows service or ASP.NET application or service.
trans-unit.target: 類別內<xref:System.Printing>命名空間不支援為 Windows 服務或 ASP.NET 應用程式或服務中使用。

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試使用這些類別時，這些應用程式類型的其中一個內可能會產生無法預期的問題，例如會受到影響服務的效能和執行階段例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: If you want to print from a Windows Forms application, see the <xref:System.Drawing.Printing> namespace.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要從 Windows Form 應用程式列印，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空間。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the resolution.
trans-unit.target: 表示解析度的值。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> class that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution" />.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> 類別的新執行個體 (Instance)，這個執行個體具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution" />。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal resolution in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 水平解析度 (單位為 DPI)。

trans-unit.source: The vertical resolution in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 垂直解析度 (單位為 DPI)。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> class that has the specified vertical and horizontal dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的垂直和水平 Dot Per Inch (DPI)。

trans-unit.source: For most printers, `resolutionX` is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and `resolutionY` is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement.
trans-unit.target: 對於大部分的印表機，`resolutionX`是透過印表機的紙張移動的方向垂直的紙張維度和`resolutionY`是平行紙張移動的方向的紙張維度。

trans-unit.source: The two values are usually the same.
trans-unit.target: 兩個值通常會一樣。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal resolution in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 水平解析度 (單位為 DPI)。

trans-unit.source: The vertical resolution in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 垂直解析度 (單位為 DPI)。

trans-unit.source: A value representing the resolution.
trans-unit.target: 表示解析度的值。

trans-unit.source: Initiates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> class that has the specified <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution" /> and the specified vertical and horizontal dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> 類別的新執行個體，這個執行個體具有指定的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution" /> 以及指定的垂直和水平 Dot Per Inch (DPI)。

trans-unit.source: For most printers, `resolutionX` is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and `resolutionY` is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement.
trans-unit.target: 對於大部分的印表機，`resolutionX`是透過印表機的紙張移動的方向垂直的紙張維度和`resolutionY`是平行紙張移動的方向的紙張維度。

trans-unit.source: The two values are usually the same.
trans-unit.target: 兩個值通常會一樣。

trans-unit.source: Gets the qualitative expression, if any, of the page resolution.
trans-unit.target: 取得頁面解析度的質化運算式 (如果有)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution" /> value that represents the level of page resolution.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution" /> 值，表示頁面解析度等級。

trans-unit.source: Returns the page resolution as a <see cref="T:System.String" />.
trans-unit.target: 傳回頁面解析度，以 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 表示。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the property values of the <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 物件之屬性值的 <see cref="T:System.Printing.PageResolution" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string is as follows:
trans-unit.target: 字串的格式如下所示：

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.X%2A> x <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.Y%2A> (Qualitative Resolution: <xref:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution>)
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.X%2A> x <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.Y%2A> (質化解析度： <xref:System.Printing.PageQualitativeResolution>)

trans-unit.source: Gets the dots-per-inch measure of the horizontal page resolution.
trans-unit.target: 取得水平頁面解析度 (單位為 DPI)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents a horizontal page resolution.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示水平頁面解析度。

trans-unit.source: For most printers, this value is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.Y%2A> is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的印表機，這個值會透過印表機的紙張移動的方向垂直紙張維度和<xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.Y%2A>是平行紙張移動的方向的紙張維度。

trans-unit.source: The two values are usually the same.
trans-unit.target: 兩個值通常會一樣。

trans-unit.source: Gets the dots-per-inch measure of the vertical page resolution.
trans-unit.target: 取得垂直頁面解析度 (單位為 DPI)。

trans-unit.source: A nullable <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> value that represents a vertical page resolution.
trans-unit.target: 可為 null 的 <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> 值，表示垂直頁面解析度。

trans-unit.source: For most printers, this value is the paper dimension that is parallel to the direction of paper movement through the printer, and <xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.X%2A> is the paper dimension that is perpendicular to the direction of paper movement.
trans-unit.target: 大部分的印表機，這個值會透過印表機的紙張移動的方向與紙張維度和<xref:System.Printing.PageResolution.X%2A>是垂直紙張移動的方向的紙張維度。

trans-unit.source: The two values are usually the same.
trans-unit.target: 兩個值通常會一樣。
